front.title: IANA Allocation Procedures for OTN Signal Type Subregistry of the GMPLS Signaling Parameters Registry

abstract.t: IANA has defined an "OTN Signal Type" subregistry of the "Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling Parameters" registry. This draft updates the OTN Signal Type subregistry to allow Specification Required policies, as defined in RFC 5226.
